text: Lieutenant General Pasquale Preziosa is a retired Italian Air Force officer, who served as Chief of the Italian Air Force. He joined the Air Force in 1971 and qualified as a Pilot.https://www.haf.gr/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Lt-Gen- Pasquale-Preziosa.pdf From August 2003 to September 2006 he served as the Defense Attaché at the Embassy of Italy, Washington, D.C., and Chief of the Cabinet of the Minister of Defence from December 2011 to February 2013. He was appointed Chief of the Air Force in 2013. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rovereto Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic Category:Italian Air Force generals Category:Aeronautica Militare chiefs of staff Category:21st-century Italian military personnel Category:20th-century Italian military personnel Category:Italian air attachés
title: Pasquale Preziosa
